content: this keychain measures to be roughly 2 5 inches tall i hung mine on my plain grey backpack to make it look more interesting and i love it **terminology used in pattern ** st s stitch es chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet double_crochet double_crochet increase two single crochets in one stitch decrease invisible decrease single_crochet two stitches together through the front loops only slip_stitch slip_stitch … x # repeat anything in the parenthesis however many times the number indicates # total number of stitches for that row number single_crochet one single_crochet in each of the following # stitches double_crochet# double_crochet # times in the next stitch turn turn your work **things you need** -royal blue navy blue baby blue black lavender and white sport weight yarn -3mm crochet hook -polyfill or cotton for stuffing -scissors -darning needle -stitch marker -pins -keychain ring -pliers
